website_summaries.verdict: For dogs that need moist food, this low-fat food is easy on the digestive tract.
pros: It's pricey, but this recipe has low fat levels and a healthy mix of fibers to aid in digestion
Specifically blended to improve the health of the dog's coat and skin as well as the immune system
Includes ginger to produce a calming effect
Some dogs prefer the taste of canned food

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but I decided to obtain through my vet for less.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Pricier than chewy
customer_reviews.text: Food has worked well for my dog who has GI issues. However the cost per case on Amazon is over $10 to $ 30 higher than what Chewy.com charges. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Howlett

customer_reviews.title: Hills Prescription Low-fat I/d food is a lifesaver for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Hills Prescription Low-fat I/d food is a lifesaver for my Yorkies. This food has put an end to their pancreatitis. This vendor delivers sooner than expected. More expensive, but worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Product is what our vet recommended. Priced was too high though

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to add that the food itself is fine the price through Amazon is very high. Now that I know my dog will be on this for the rest of his life I will be purchasing it through my pet store that has a clinic where I pay $2.95 a can.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine c, New Hampshire

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended
customer_reviews.text: My dog had pancreatitis and the vet wanted her to eat less fat. This she likes so we are both happy. Plus I get the convenience of the delivery to my front door.

customer_reviews.title: Dog got sick
customer_reviews.text: I had to take my dog to vet after feeding him i/d Digestive Care Original Low Fat Canned Dog Food , very I saw something in white But was wondering what the Ingredients were. I had to put my Puppy on Antibiotics for one week after I fed just 2 cans of the food.
customer_reviews.author: Sark

customer_reviews.title: If you Pet is experiencing digestion problems.
customer_reviews.text: My Jack Russell Terrier was having some digestion issues. I took him to the Vet and they recommended changing his diet to this type of food. I wasn't sorry for the visit or change in the food. He's doing great now. The change helped him readjust his diet to food he could digest easier, without compromising nutritional value.
customer_reviews.author: James Ziessler

product_meta.title: Hill's Prescription Diet Pet Nutrition I/D Low Fat Digestive Care Chicken Flavor Canned Dog Food, 13 oz, 12 Pack Wet Food, White
product_meta.description:
inappropriate levels of fat in the blood, inability to digest protein, or lack of digestive enzymes produced by the body can affect your dog's digestive health. Efficient digestion is essential for your dog to be able to build and repair tissues and obtain energy, and for these reasons it is important to feed a food that is formulated to help support digestive health. For many dogs experiencing digestive challenges, its also very important to feed a food with a low fat level.

hill's nutritionists & veterinarians developed prescription diet i/D low fat clinical Nutrition especially formulated to support your dog's digestive health. In fact, I/D low fat is clinically proven nutrition to calm & soothe the digestive tract.
feature_bullets: Optimal choice for canine GI patients that need low fat, great tasting nutrition therapy. Minimizes stimulation of the pancreas, decreasing risk of relapsing pancreatitis.
